scripts.build:baidu-dll: yarn predev && powershell -Command "$env:CARGO_TARGET_DIR='build/baidu_verify-build\windows'; cargo build --release --manifest-path crates/baidu_verify/Cargo.toml; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path 'dist/baidu_verify\windows' | Out-Null; Copy-Item 'build/baidu_verify-build\windows\release\baidu_verify.dll' -Destination 'dist/baidu_verify\windows\baidu_verify.dll' -Force"
